description.translate:
Unlike the other fairy courts, the Autumn court is an empty throne ruled by none. 
 We do however have a sovereign, the Pumpkin King.
 As the name may suggest, he is not a real King, he is more a lord of mischief and fear.
 But we indulge him since no autumn fey is foolish enough to take on the mantle of Autumn Ruler.

I will leave the choice of preparing a dish to you this time! A Stuffed Pumpkin? ...Well, I support your decision sweetie...

description.text:
Very well! One stuffed Pumpkin, for the Pumpkin King! 

-The Pumpkin King has received your gift, and offers you a gift in return...It's unsure if he appreciated your offering, or he is sending you a message...-
